Authentic Italian Food

Family-Owned

Piccola Trattoria is an authentic Italian restaurant, with the charm and comfort of a real Italian Trattoria.
Piccola Trattoria’s seasonal menu features an array of homemade pastas such as cannelloni, gnocchi and pappardelle. Come warm up with melt-in-your-mouth Bistecca, Boulliobese di Pesce or Branzino.
Piccola Trattoria’s cozy atmosphere is perfect for date night or to relax with good friends and a glass of vino.

Discover

The real taste of Italy

Forget you are in New York, and enjoy the experience of travelling to an authentic Italian trattoria.

Learn About Our Food
Family Dinners

For All Occasions

Celebrating an anniversary, a birthday, or just a friendly gathering? Piccola Trattoria will offer the right environment so that you can sit back and enjoy a lovely evening with some of the best food in New York.

ABOUT US

Chef and owner Sergio Pennachio offers authentic Italian food and an inviting rustic atmosphere.
